value.text: Take a look at some of the projects we are working on now or have worked on in the past. Whether they're web development, mobile development, data science, or design, our solutions have been able to serve a wide variety of nonprofits.

nodes.Name: Project Ropa Offline Forms App
nodes.Overview: A check-ins app for volunteers to track deliveries of clean clothing to the homeless in LA

nodes.Name: Coordinating Survival Kit Distribution
nodes.Overview: A system streamlining on-the-ground distribution of homeless aid packages by thousands of volunteers

nodes.Name: Westside Food Bank
nodes.Overview: A food pantry locator to provide information on the nearest available pantries for the food-insecure

nodes.Name: Gladeo
nodes.Overview: A “Pathway Mapper” web application to assist community college students in planning their coursework

nodes.Name: Swipe Out Hunger
nodes.Overview: A donor-donee matching app allowing students to share swipes with those struggling from food insecurity

nodes.Name: Handle With Care
nodes.Overview: A tracker app for homeless aid packages so volunteers can be better coordinate the process

nodes.Name: Friends of the Semel Institute
nodes.Overview: Data analysis (Blackbaud) of a UCLA nonprofit’s donor base to maximize donations toward mental health awareness and research

nodes.Name: Beloved Beauty
nodes.Overview: A donor deck to increase funding for victims of sex trafficking, and a user survey to understand mentor-mentee interaction
